name: Tank
description: Bolster – Damaging abilities deal 1 less attack to you for 1 turn.

name: Ranged
description: Aimed Shot – After 1 turn, deal 3 attack to your target.

name: Healer
description: 2 healing per turn, Ability – Give a target +1 health.

name: Barbarian
description: +1 attack on front line, chance to survive fatal combat at 1 HP.

name: Rogue
description: Stealth – Backline only, +2 attack from stealth.

name: Hunter
description: On play, summons a 2/2 Wolf to closest adjacent tile.

name: Storm Caller
description: Deal 1 attack to 1–3 enemies.

name: Banshee
description: Wail – Reduce ATK of nearby enemies by 1 for 1 turn.

name: Armorer
description: Craft Armor – Grants +2 temp armor to adjacent minion.

name: Wandering Healer
description: Heals adjacent friendly unit for 1 at end of your turn.

name: Grizzled Veteran
description: Takes 1 less attack from abilities.

name: Field Scout
description: Gains +1 attack if placed in the backline.

name: Mercenary
description: No faction. Has +2 attack when no friendly units are adjacent.

name: Torchbearer
description: On attack, remove stealth from adjacent targets.

name: War Banner
description: 0/2, adjacent minions get +2 ATK, front line only.

name: Banner of Command
description: 0/2, all friendly frontliners get +1 ATK.

name: Banner of the Brave
description: 0/2, grants +1 permanent ATK to units that move front from back line.

name: Staff of Ember
description: Grants fire attack with burn chance, mages get Fiery Wake (2 AOE attack).

name: Blooming Wildstaff
description: Heal 1 HP/turn, healers gain Rejuvenation (4 healing over 2 turns).

name: Polearm
description: Allows melee units to attack from the back line.

name: Flaming Sword
description: +2 ATK, applies 1 burn attack for 2 turns.

name: Frostbrand Axe
description: +1 ATK, 50% chance to freeze target for 1 turn.

name: Twin Daggers
description: +1 ATK, allows attacking twice per action.

name: Orb of Chaos
description: Targeted magical abilities hit 1–2 extra targets.

name: Executioner's Axe
description: On kill, can attack again this turn.

name: Tome of Countering
description: +1 ATK, grants 'Spell Lock' (cancels next enemy spell, 3-turn cooldown).

name: Explosive Arrow Quiver
description: Attacks deal splash attack to adjacent enemies.

name: Sharpened Arrows
description: Every second attack deals +2 attack.

name: Hookshot
description: Grants 'Hookshot' ability – pull target from back line.

name: Amulet of Flux
description: Each spell cast gives this unit +1 ATK this turn.

name: Iron Sword
description: +1 attack.

name: Chainmail
description: +1 armor, +1 health.

name: Healing Stone
description: Once per turn, restore 2 HP to this unit.

name: Spyglass
description: Grants +1 attack if the target is on the backline.

name: Quickblade
description: Allows a second attack at -1 attack.

name: Master of Decay
description: Passive – Gravebound: Gain 1 Soul whenever a friendly unit dies. Hero Power (2 mana): Necrotic Pulse – Spend 1 Soul to deal 2 attack or heal 2 HP.

name: Bone Thrall
description: Frontline only, on death summon a 1/1 Remnant.

name: Rotting Ghoul
description: Frontline only, on death deal 1 attack to adjacent enemies.

name: Bone Warden
description: Units behind this take 1 less attack.

name: Ghastly Archer
description: +1 attack to enemies under 50% HP.

name: Soul Collector
description: Gains 1 HP when friendly minion dies.

name: Carrion Bat
description: On kill, draw 1 card.

name: Crypt Reaver
description: Attacks 2 adjacent enemies.

name: Wailing Banshee
description: On play, silence all enemies in a column.

name: Dead Knight
description: Can't be healed, on kill summon Bone Thrall.

name: Undying Horror
description: Deathrattle – return this to your hand.

name: Raise Dead
description: Resurrect random friendly unit with 1 HP / 1 ATK.

name: Soul Burn
description: Deal 3 attack, heal hero for attack dealt.

name: Dark Pact
description: Destroy friendly unit, draw 2 cards.

name: Mass Grave
description: Resurrect all Bone Thralls / Skeletons where they died.

name: Unholy Surge
description: All undead gain +1 ATK this turn.

name: Tome of Eternal Rot
description: Once/turn, when a unit dies, reduce cost of a random spell by 1.

name: Scythe of Sorrow
description: +2 ATK, on kill gain +1 temp mana next turn.

name: Skull Lantern
description: If a minion returns from graveyard, draw 1 card (once per turn).
